feed.title: Li Lab at Louisiana Tech
feed.subtitle: Our Lab performs interdisciplinary research to synthesize and understand the structure dynamics of novel solid state materials. Currently we are interested in energy storage materials, quantum materials, and heterocatalysts. We welcome students with backgrounds in chemistry, physics, and (chemical, materials, mechanical) engineering to join us :)

entry.title: Science Day in J.S. Clark Magnet Elementary School

link.title: Science Day in J.S. Clark Magnet Elementary School

entry.content:
We participated in the Science Day event at J.S. Clark Magnet Elementary School in Monroe, where we introduced students to the chemistry behind batteries and guided them through a hands-on fruit battery activity. The kids were enthusiastic and deeply engaged!

Glad to to encouter many students with curiosity and hope our hands-on activity will motivate them to become the next-generation scientists.
